name: Arachnocrat
description: The Arachnocrat is a medium fiend with a sinister presence, marked by its high Dexterity and Charisma. It displays traits of an aristocrat, equipped with a cunning and intelligent demeanor that belies its true nature. Its skin may take on a golden hue when its victims succumb to its poison.
memorable: Its ability to restrain foes with gilded webbing adds a unique twist to combat, while its aristocratic disguise makes it a master infiltrator.
goals: To manipulate and control others, often infiltrating noble gatherings and enacting its deceitful plans.
relations: May work alongside other fiends or arachnids and could serve higher fiendish powers.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy places, particularly where it can blend in with nobility or spiders.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma enhance its combat effectiveness and social manipulation. Magic Resistance provides significant protection against spells.
weaknesses: Susceptible to silvered weapons and certain magical attacks that bypass its resistances.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with claw strikes that ensnare opponents in webbing, along with a venomous bite that can poison and paralyze.
most_powerful_ability: Bite attack that can deliver potent poison damage and paralyze creatures, making them vulnerable and incapacitating them.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 10 feet, allowing it to detect foes in complete darkness.
skills: Excels in deception with a +8 modifier, allowing for effective manipulation and trickery.
additional_information: Immune to fire and poison damage.
Resistant to cold damage and nonmagical weapon attacks.
Can see through magical darkness, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
